description:
Astrology Premium is the most luxury astrology and horoscope application for the Playbook! It uses graphics acceleration to make the user interface smooth and rich with HD graphics.

FEATURES:
✔ Native app with smooth and luxury UI that saves up to 3 users.
✔ Daily predictions with charts based on biorhythms.
✔ Yearly horoscope. Predict your relationship, sex, money and health.
✔ Matchmaking! Check zodiac compability.
✔ Numerology. Use the numbers to unlock your fate.
✔ Zodiac info. Do you know your planet? Your stone and color?
✔ Even more details like: Chinese sign, your tree and birth color.
✔ Stylish HD graphics and nice music.
✔ Multi language.


Tags: Astrology, Horoscope, Horoscopes, Love, Work, Health, Zodiac, Zodiacal, Yearly Horoscope, Compatibility, Chinese Horoscope, Druid Horoscope, Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces, astro, psychic, readings, predictions, forecasts, Rat, Ox, Tiger, Rabbit, Dragon, Snake, Horse, Ram, Monkey, Rooster, Dog, Pig.
